hints.content:
We can think of $\purpleC{908}$ as $\purpleC{9\text{ hundreds}}$ and $\purpleC{8 \text{ ones}}$.  

We can think of $\blueD{24}$ as $\blueD{2\text{ tens}}$  and $\blueD{4\text{ ones}}$.

$\phantom{=}\purpleC{908}+\blueD{24}$

$=\purpleC{9\text{ hundreds}}+\purpleC{8\text{ ones}}+\blueD{2\text{ tens}}+\blueD{4\text{ ones}}$

$= \purpleC{9\text{ hundreds}}+\blueD{2\text{ tens}}+\purpleC{8\text{ ones}}+\blueD{4\text{ ones}}$
The answer: $ 9\text{ hundreds} + 2 \text{ tens}+8 \text{ ones}+4 \text{ ones}$

question.content:
**Which of the following is equal to $908+24$?**
